annotations.description: The Kentucky Buck was created by bartender Eric Castro for Polite Provisions, the award winning bar in San Diego. There is an indication that this drink coul...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Kentucky Buck

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Bourbon
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Ginger Syrup
Top Ginger Beer
Candied Ginger/Strawberry Slice Garnish

Shake and pour over ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6cFWJBrdQe8
title: Kentucky Buck
